captions.text: The best first sentence ever, hell yeah
A Minecraft...
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Hopes he doesn't suck at everything.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Crafting, brewing and enchanting.
Walking down the slabby road,
Waiting for an epic new chunk to load.
Grassy dirt 'n' dirty grass,
On a trip to find some sand and craft some glass.
So when I fall, please don't let me go,
When I dance, please don't steal the show,
When I'm a noob, please don't let me know,
Build a house? Please not in the snow.
It's so awesome to be a Minecraft,
Phantaboulous to be a Dude.
I got all my friends playing with me,
Too bad that there are only three!
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Hopes he doesn't suck at everything.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Crafting, brewing and enchanting.
I need you to hold my hand.
I think I'm going to take a stand.
Against that server admin guy.
I can't stand it that he can fly!
On COD, I used to be,
The guy who liked to join a T-bag orgy.
Though I felt there was an empty hole,
I just wanted to dig deep down and find some coal.
What's a creeper, what's a zombie,
What's the nether, what's the ending,
OMG I just found some iron,
I can finally craft me a chestplate!
2 days later I found it pretty gay, (no offense!)
Looking for the ores all day long,
But I guess it's in my DNA,
Forever digging deep, I guess that's how I roll ya.
So I, keep digging down, right next to town,
Kinda hoping that, I will not drown,
Keep browsin' caves cause I don't wanna live in a cave like this!
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Hopes he doesn't suck at everything.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Crafting, brewing and enchanting.
I need you to make me OP,
Because I wanna build a shop,
Selling all my awesome and fancy rocks,
That's all it is, the game with blocks.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Hopes he doesn't suck at everything.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Crafting, brewing and enchanting.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Hopes he doesn't suck at everything.
A Minecraft, Minecraft dude,
Crafting, brewing and enchanting.

comments.author: Michelle Joy Bolotaolo

comments.text:
Again? They're all still here. The people with no life but to write big 
walls of text on a video that has absolutely nothing to do with the video 
that said comment is posted on. Those people could go outside, build a 
sandcastle, maybe play football or annoy the neighbour's cat, but no. They 
sit at a virtual screen typing big walls of text, hoping that people will 
see that they have no life, which is what they achieved. Well, maybe some 
do it for fun, they still have a life, and maybe some do it just for giving 
people lyrics even though you can just read it off of the music video 
itself, cause it's pointless to put lyrics on say a lets play, a turtle, or 
even a redstone tutorial. They only go on music videos. Then again, if 
people can just read the lyrics, then they DO have no life. Hm, I never 
ever thought of that. Anyway, back on topic. Those people will spend five 
to ten minutes behind a screen writing a big wall of text that means 
nothing and could never in a million years relate to the big box above of 
the comment called the video. I don't know why people do it, but the only 
reason I can call right now is no life. oh! There's another one. A big wall 
of text known as lyrics, they consist of many lines. Like, many many very 
very lines.
